meanings.definition: To wait longer than someone else in order to achieve a desired outcome.
meanings.sent1: She outwaited her friends at the bus stop to ensure she got a seat.
meanings.sent2: The patient outwaited the doctor in the waiting room.
meanings.sent3: The cat outwaited the mouse in a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner outwaited his competitors to cross the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The detective outwaited the suspect, leading to a confession.
